South_Bend.Kelley-Fredrickson House and Office Buil: Kelley-Fredrickson House and Office Building, also known as the Arthur Fredrickson House & Candy Store, is a historic home and commercial building located at South Bend, St. Joseph County, Indiana. The house was built in 1892, and is a 2 1/2-story, irregular plan, Queen Anne style frame dwelling.
